page.title: 14SUPERSTITIOUS BUNGAY
page.content: During a thunderstorm in 1577,a terrible black dog appeared during evensong at St.Marys church.It terrorised the congregation, leaping for their necks before running back into the rain.To this day the scratch marks can be seen on the door. The Three Tuns is a hotel in Earsham St,and is said to be haunted by over 20 ghosts.The ghosts switch lights on and off and laugh.There's a cold spot on the stairs beneath where Rex Bocon hung himself. In St.Marys church yard there is a stone said to be the Druids stone.A custom prevailed until recently that children danced around the stone 12 times to raise the evil one.
